wikipedia_page.main: David Robert Brooks (born 8 July 1997) is a Welsh professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for EFL Championship club AFC Bournemouth and the Wales national team. He played for both Wales and England at youth level before making his senior debut for Wales in 2017.
